title: Find surface area of a cylinder
contentHtml:
Write a program to find surface area of a cylinder

Surface area of cylinder = 2 × π × Radius × Height

Radius : 2
Height : 3

Surface area : 62.83185307179586
markdown:
## Write a program to find surface area of a cylinder

Surface area of cylinder = 2 × π × `Radius` × `Height`

```
Radius : 2
Height : 3

Surface area : 62.83185307179586
```
